mdRecord.dcterms:title: The New Foundland dog: a descriptive ballad : sung with enthusiastic applause by H. Russell / the words by F.W.N. Bailey ; the music composed by Henry Russell
Life saver! Wave stemmer! Deep diver! away!
Newfoundland dog
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Russell, Henry, 1812-1900 [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: Bayley, F. W. N. (Frederic William Naylor), 1808-1853 [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Title page illustration: Dog leaping from boat into ocean to rescue drowning man / Lith of Endicott. [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Library's copy imperfect; lacking title page and 1st page of music. [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Seventh title in a bound volume of sheet music from the library of Mrs. Harriet Irvine. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Songs (Medium voice) with piano
Ballads, English
